changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION ruleform.is_terminal_state(service text, status text) RETURNS boolean AS 'com.chiralbehaviors.CoRE.meta.models.JobModelImpl.is_terminal_state(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)' LANGUAGE javaU VOLATILE COST 100; ALTER FUNCTION ruleform.is_terminal_state(text, text) OWNER TO core;
